message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please track and compile the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, for the period from January 2022 to April 2025 (including January 2022 and April 2025). Please cite all the statistics from government websites.

Please output the compiled data in one Markdown table format. The column names in the table should be, in order: Month, House Price in England (Pounds), House Price in Wales (Pounds), House Price in Scotland (Pounds), House Price in Northern Ireland (Pounds)
For the column 'Month', list the month in the format 2022/01, 2022/02.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

To gather the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland for the period from January 2022 to April 2025, I need to find specific datasets from government websites such as those of UK's Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities, or HM Land Registry.

<search>average monthly house prices England Scotland Wales Northern Ireland January 2022 to April 2025</search>

Search query: average monthly house prices England Scotland Wales Northern Ireland January 2022 to April 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.statista.com/statistics/285705/monthly-house-price-index-in-the-united-kingdom-uk/?srsltid=AfmBOord1L84NiLu_3VdvwxEeAR5THQLNAJ0Pyw3ikMRz8ccDGe51bsN):
Monthly house price index in the UK 2015-2025 The house price index (HPI) shows changes in the value of residential properties in England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.

[Doc 2](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/privaterentandhousepricesuk/december2025):
Private rent and house prices, UK: December 2025 Average house prices increased to £292,000 (1.4%) in England, £211,000 (1.5%) in Wales, and £192,000 (3.3%) in Scotland, in the 12 months to ...

[Doc 3](https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-house-price-index-for-january-2025):
UK House Price Index for January 2025 UK House Price Index for January 2025. The UK HPI shows house price changes for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

Based on these sources:

<search>average monthly house prices England Scotland Wales Northern Ireland January 2022 April 2025</search>

Search query: average monthly house prices England Scotland Wales Northern Ireland January 2022 April 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-house-price-index-for-january-2025):
UK House Price Index for January 2025 - GOV.UK UK house prices rose by 4.9% in the year to January 2025, up from the revised estimate of 4.6% in the 12 months to December 2024.

[Doc 2](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/privaterentandhousepricesuk/december2025):
Private rent and house prices, UK: December 2025 Average house prices increased to £292,000 (1.4%) in England, £211,000 (1.5%) in Wales, and £192,000 (3.3%) in Scotland, in the 12 months to ...

[Doc 3](https://www.statista.com/statistics/285705/monthly-house-price-index-in-the-united-kingdom-uk/?srsltid=AfmBOoo7eFdX8UU2_56f5V9M97hV0J-22XfrzulbwN1KMTI4z6PjeQND):
Monthly house price index in the UK 2015-2025 - Statista In April 2025, the index measured 101.7 index points, showing an increase of 1.7 percent since January 2023.

Compiled data:

```markdown
| Month                | House Price in England (Pounds) | House Price in Wales (Pounds) | House Price in Scotland (Pounds) | House Price in Northern Ireland (Pounds) |
|----------------------|----------------------------------|------------------------------|-------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| 2022/01              |                                |                              |                               |                                         |
| 2022/02              |                                |                              |                               |                                         |
| 2022/03              |                                |                              |                               |                                         |
| 2022/04              |                                |                              |                               |                                         |
| ...                  |                                |                              |                               |                                         |
| 2025/04              |                                |                              |                               |                                         |
```

Given the complexity and necessity for exact figures per month:

<search>monthly house prices England Scotland Wales Northern Ireland January 2022 April 2025</search>

Search query: monthly house prices England Scotland Wales Northern Ireland January 2022 April 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.statista.com/statistics/285705/monthly-house-price-index-in-the-united-kingdom-uk/?srsltid=AfmBOoo-p6XiFcwbXEyolLNrz24Rn_7Cs_rHOdCLA2Su8ww5kkGPXYN2):
Monthly house price index in the UK 2015-2025 - Statista In April 2025, the index measured 101.7 index points, showing an increase of 1.7 percent since January 2023. UK house prices grew rapidly during ...

[Doc 2](https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-house-price-index-for-january-2025):
UK House Price Index for January 2025 - GOV.UK UK house prices rose by 4.9% in the year to January 2025, up from the revised estimate of 4.6% in the 12 months to December 2024.

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the previous ...
